submittedOn.description: The date and time of the submission. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ

periodsOfAccount.description:
Indicates whether the customer has periods of account.

If this value is true, then periodsOfAccountDates will be returned.

periodsOfAccountDates.description:
List of periods of account. These will be returned if a customer has submitted periods of account.

If periodsOfAccount is set to false, then this field will not be returned.

startDate.description: The start date of the period of account. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

endDate.description: The end date of the period of account. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD
